Uses of Class
tripleplay.anim.Animation

  • Packages that use Animation 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.anim  
    tripleplay.flump  
    tripleplay.ui  

    • Uses of Animation in tripleplay.anim

      Subclasses of Animation in tripleplay.anim 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Animation.Action
      Executes an action and completes immediately.
      static class  Animation.Delay
      Delays a specified number of milliseconds.
      static class  Animation.Flip
      Processes a Flipbook.
      static class  Animation.Interped<R>
      A base class for animations that interpolate values.
      static class  Animation.One
      Animates a single scalar value.
      static class  Animation.Repeat
      Repeats its underlying animation over and over again (until removed).
      static class  Animation.Shake
      An animation that shakes a layer randomly in the x and y directions.
      static class  Animation.Two
      Animates a pair of scalar values (usually a position).
      Methods in tripleplay.anim with type parameters of type Animation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Animation>
      T      		 Animator.add(T anim)
      Registers an animation with this animator.
      <T extends Animation>
      T      		 AnimGroup.add(T anim)
      Adds an animation to this group.
      abstract <T extends Animation>
      T      		 AnimBuilder.add(T anim)
      Registers an animation with this builder.
      Methods in tripleplay.anim that return Animation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Animation AnimBuilder.flipbookAt(playn.scene.GroupLayer parent, float x, float y, Flipbook book)
      Starts a flipbook animation that displays the supplied book at the specified position in the supplied parent.
      Animation AnimBuilder.flipbookAt(playn.scene.GroupLayer parent, pythagoras.f.XY pos, Flipbook book)
      Starts a flipbook animation that displays the supplied book at the specified position in the supplied parent.
      Animation AnimGroup.toAnim()
      Returns a single animation that will execute all of the animations in this group to completion (in parallel) and will report itself as complete when the final animation in the group is complete.

    • Uses of Animation in tripleplay.flump

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PlayMovie
      Plays a movie until it ends.
      Methods in tripleplay.flump that return Animation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Animation MoviePlayer.animate(String name)
      Creates an Animation that plays a one-shot movie.

    • Uses of Animation in tripleplay.ui

      Methods in tripleplay.ui that return Animation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Animation Menu.AnimFn.go(Menu menu, Animator animator)
      For the given menu and animator, adds an animation to the given animator and returns it.
